articles.title: Google explains how you're using Magic Editor and Magic Eraser wrong - Android Authority
articles.description: They both remove unwanted stuff from your photos, but when it comes to Google Magic Editor vs Magic Eraser, there's a time and a place to use one over the other.
articles.content:
• Magic Eraser works well for removing objects and people in the background.
  • Magic Editor is superior at generating large portions of an image, like when removing foreground objects.
